full_text: This kid is gonna be a star that they’ll embarrassingly lowball then trade for 40 cents on the dollar. https://t.co/4nX8PEpmyC

Ok so here’s the deal for the Bruins. 

Get 1 point. Or NYI loses in any fashion and they’re in. 

It shouldn’t be this difficult. But averaging an injured player a game hasn’t been ideal either.
Islanders lose. Bruins at worst get this to OT and they clinch a playoff spot.
